title: Bissell Pet Hair Eraser Lithium Ion Cordless Hand Vacuum, Purple
description: Remove more embedded dirt and pet hair with a motorized brush tool and 14V lithium ion battery. The pet hair eraser handheld cordless vacuum features triple level filtration and a large, easy-to-empty dirt bin to help get rid of pet hair easily. Set of specialized pet tools includes: motorized brush tool, upholstery tool, and crevice tool. Perfect for cleaning stairs, upholstery, car seats and more
